name: Goro
description: Goro is easy to learn, but a challenging casual game. You control a colored square that must pass through labyrinths filled with various obstacles, for example, splitting you into pieces of a platform, accelerating and slowing down plates, secret traps, secret passages, narrow apertures. All of them are needed to test your reaction. The game gradually plunges you more difficult situations. Increase your skills. Overcome obstacles. Have fun with this game.
